Package edu.cmu.minorthird.text.gui

Swing components that can be used to view and/or manually annotate text.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
MarkupControls A scheme for marking spans up in a labeling.
MinimalMarkupControls A compact control window for marking spans up in a labeling.
MixupDebugger View results of executing a mixup program.
OnlineClassifierDocumentEditor Interactivly edit the documents for an OnlineLearning Experiment
OnlineLearnerEditor Interactively edit the contents of a TextBase and MutableTextLabels.
OnlineLearnerEditor.EditTypeAction Change the type of span being edited.
SpanDocument A StyledDocument that holds a single span.
SpanEditor Interactivly edit the subspans associated with a particular document span.
SpanLabeler Interactivly edit document spans.
SpanViewer View the contents of a span, using the util.gui.Viewer framework.
SpanViewer.ControlledTextViewer A text view of a span, plus controls
SpanViewer.IdViewer View of the span's documentId and documentGroupId
SpanViewer.TextViewer A text view of a span.
SpanViewer.TokenViewer A tokenized view of a span.
StatusMessage A simple display tool for status messages.
StatusMessagePanel A panel including a status message on the bottom.
TextBaseEditor Interactively edit the contents of a TextBase and MutableTextLabels.
TextBaseEditor.EditTypeAction Change the type of span being edited.
TextBaseEditorPlusLabeler Label top-level "document" spans in a TextBase.
TextBaseLabeler Label top-level "document" spans in a TextBase.
TextBaseViewer Interactively view the contents of a TextBase and TextLabels.
TextLabelsViewer View the contents of a bunch of spans, using the util.gui.Viewer framework.
TrackedTextBaseComponent A TextBaseViewer augmented with a ViewerTracker component.
ViewerTracker Tracks what's selected in the documentList of a TextBaseViewer.
ZoomingTextLabelsViewer View the contents of a bunch of spans, using the util.gui.Viewer framework.
 

Package edu.cmu.minorthird.text.gui Description

Swing components that can be used to view and/or manually annotate text.

These classes are mains: TextBaseViewer, TextBaseEditor, and MixupDebugger.
